The Earth and Magical Mogis (info in a story that is odd and unusual)
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): The Earth and Magical Mogis (info in a story that is odd and unusual)
By SlapShotz54 on Wednesday, June 12, 2002 - 02:30 pm:

Hello. I am a Blackie (MOGI/???) today in december in morx. I am 8 months old. My trainer decided to move today, so i am off to Goat.

Hello again. i evolved today in Goat, to be an Offshore(MOGI/GOAT), after i ate only 1 special goat food to "localize" me. i am now 11 months, only 3 months after i left morx at 8 mo.

My The Earth attack is at level 3 with my stats at
life338
power656
int53
speed402
defense247





,but now i am at 1.6 years old.
the eart attack i did to to a monster was critical and did, 587 damage, and 59 guts down.
i did the attck again later with more power and i did 81 gutsdown, and 686 damage to ostrich at b class. i do this king of gutsdown often.

Do you think i am odd or unusual for evolving or attacking like this?

By Deadbuffalo on Wednesday, June 12, 2002 - 03:50 pm:

Evolving from only one "special" food is uncommon, but from what we understand, its very possible that one feeding will do the trick sometimes.
As for the earth attack, the guts damage was perfectly normal, the earth is good at that. The damage is very high indeed, but it was a critical attack then, and you had more power later. 800 or so power is more than enough to do that type of damage against most of the computer opponents with a tech of that caliber.
On a side note, those aren't bad stats for an 11 month old monster, especially considering you were raised in morx for such a long time.

Slappy, nice job "being" the monster. The creative approach to a normal question is appreciated.

By SlapShotz54 on Wednesday, June 12, 2002 - 04:31 pm:

well, as you know, i am not "ordinary", and i just thought my stats and somewhat unusual behavior were worth mentioning.
Now, back to the turn tables...
